data.name: aerofly RC 8 - Expansion Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
This aerofly RC 8 Expansion Pack 2 includes 90 new aircraft models and 20 additional sceneries.

The primary focus of this Expansion Pack 2 is realistic looking scale models and includes many famous aircraft.
This is the right addition to your aerofly RC 8 if you want to enjoy flying stunning looking scale fighters, jets, helicopters, gliders and professional multicopters on model airfields with lots of room or with fantastic slope soaring landscapes.

Choose from 20 popular sceneries like real world airports (e.g. the German airports Winzeln, Hahnweide, Wasserkuppe), popular RC flying event locations (Triple Tree, Tucson,...) and scenic slope soaring places.

INCLUDED AIRCRAFT


Scale models:
  • B-17G
  • Bf109E
  • Bleriot XI
  • Caravelle
  • D.H.89
  • DC-3
  • DHC-6
  • Do-X
  • F4U Corsair
  • F7F Tigercat
  • Falke SF 25-C
  • Falke SF 25-C

  • Fokker Dr.1
  • Fokker Dr.1 Micro

  • Fw 190
  • GeeBee
  • Hall Bulldog
  • J-3 Cub
  • Micro Trojan
  • P-40E

Gliders:

Helicopters:

  • Arvada East Field (Colorado, USA)

  • Grassau (Bavaria, Germany)
  • Hahnweide (Baden-Württemberg, Germany)
  • Half Moon Bay (California, USA)

data.short_description: The aerofly RC 8 Expansion Pack 2 includes 90 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Version of Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or Vulkan compatible 3D graphic card with at least 1 GB of RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 or Vulkan compatible 3D graphic card with at least 2 GB of RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
